title: Investigating the properties and agronomic benefits of onion peel and chicken feather-derived biochars
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Adewale George Adeniyi, Ebuka Chizitere Emenike, Abdelrahman O. Ezzat, Kingsley O. Iwuozor, Omar H. Abd-Elkader, Hamad A. Al-Lohedan, Toluwalase Ojeyemi, Harvis Bamidele Saka, Stephen Sunday Emmanuel
